posts.post_content:
The following T201 cards are for sale...each is SGC graded...add $3 shipping for one card or $5 for two or more...payment by check, money order, or Paypal.  PM or email for scans or with wantlists for commons as most of the set is available.

Summers/Jennings - SGC 50 - $100
Speaker/Gardner - SGC 40 - $120
Matthewson/Bridwell - SGC 40 - $175
Johnson/Street - SGC 10 - $150 (clipped corner, otherwise VG-EX)
Collins/Baker - SGC 40 - $85
Evers/Chance - SGC 50 - $150
Brown/Hofman - SGC 50 - $125
Huggins/Bresnahan - SGC 60 - $225
